mods.abstract: Model of soldiers (Middle Kingdom Dyanasty XII) at an Egyptian Museum; model of soldiers wearing kilts and holding spears and shields stand in several rows upon flat surfaces; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
